docs.snippet: The U.S. Supreme Court on Saturday reinstated an Arizona law that makes it a felony to collect early ballots, stepping into a contentious political issue days before the presidential election and dealing a blow to Democratic get-out-the-vote effor...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Saturday reinstated an Arizona law that makes it a felony to collect early ballots, stepping into a contentious political issue days before the presidential election and dealing a blow to Democratic get-out-the-vote efforts.

headline.main: US Supreme Court Reinstates Arizona Ballot Collection Ban
headline.print_headline: US Supreme Court Reinstates Arizona Ballot Collection Ban
